concept.title: QueueMetrics Integration
concept.shortdesc: - QueueMetrics Integration App provides the interface to connect your PBX and QueueMetrics.

conbody.p: With the QueueMetrics Integration App, you can:

ul.li: Apply a QueueMetrics Live Demo ID
Integrate Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and QueueMetrics Live
Integrate Yeastar S-Series VoIP PBX and QueueMetrics On-Premise

section.title: About QueueMetrics
section.p: QueueMetrics is a call center suite for Asterisk telephony system. Learn more about QueueMetrics.
